content.description: Start on some medium holds and take your pick of big holds to the top and find a setup to top out.
content.location: Just right of the main path into the crag, on hueco'd rock facing the parking lot.

content.description: Super easy holds on a roof, then heel hook your way onto mossy crimps for the topout. You can make this harder by making it more contrived and traversing all the way to the lip before topping out. This climb can be painful.
content.location: Start at the right base of the obvious roof across from the pavilion.

content.description:
Starts at the short wall across from the parking lot. This wall is full of super short (6-8ft) easy warmup boulders. This area also includes the few relatively tall boulders right at the parking lot trail entrance. They all have tons of pockets that are always chalked up, but I've never once seen anyone climbing them.

 The most obvious feature has been posted as its own area here: mountainproject.com/area/10…
